headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  CALMAN, ROBIN S.

snippet: CALMAN--Robin S.,of Rye Brook, NY, passed away suddenly on Wednesday, April 20, 2016 at her home where she lived with her husband of 31 years. She was 57 years old. She is survived by her devoted husband, Charles Calman, her cherished children Jason and Lauren, her parents Lawrence and Mildred Gutner, her brother Richard and his wife Kathy, beloved niece and nephews Samantha, Alexander and Matthew Gutner, In-laws Donald and Helene Calman and sister and brother-in-law Janet Calman and Paul Goldenberg. She was predeceased by her Brother Ira Gutner. Services and burial took place on Friday, April 22, 2016. The family will be sitting at their home on Sunday and Monday, from 2pm-5pm and 7pm-9pm. Contributions may be made to the Crohn's and Colitis Foundation of Westchester at www.ccfa.org. Charles Calman Jason Calman Lauren Calman 1/3
